bib.title: Using Sentinel-2 Images for Soil Organic Carbon Content Mapping in Croplands of Southwestern France. The Usefulness of Sentinel-1/2 Derived Moisture Maps and Mismatches between Sentinel Images and Sampling Dates
bib.author: D. URBINA-SALAZAR and E. VAUDOUR and N. BAGHDADI and E. CESCHIA and A. C. RICHER-DE-FORGES and S. LEHMANN and D. ARROUAYS
